column1: Little Goat Diner////This place oozes "Chicago".. Intended to meet family here for dinner
column2: but last minute changes ended with me riding solo. I got a bar seat and ordered the biscuits and gravy
column3: with a side of hash browns.. In short
column4: I came in hungry and left with half my food uneaten. The biscuits and Â gravy were oddly sugary and the hash browns just did not taste right. However
column5: I was at the bar next to the order kiosk and was able to see first hand how they handle food and the orders
column6: and at that vantage it kind of makes you feel like you are apart of the staff. The place is ran like a navy ship. I saw so much food go out that I wanted to taste.. I may have just ordered the wrong thing (for me) and will be giving this place a second chance when I find the opportunity.
